item.title: TrueSkill Through Time. The full scientific documentation
item.description: Most estimators implemented for the video game industry cannot obtain reliable initial estimates nor guarantee comparability between distant estimates. TrueSkill Through Time solves all these problems by modeling the entire history of activities using a single Bayesian network. This algorithm requires a few iterations to converge, allowing millions of observations to be analyzed using any low-end computer. To support the use of reliable learning estimators, we provide the first implementations of TrueSkill Through Time for Julia, Python and R.

item.title: Faithfulness-boost effect
item.description: Playing as a team with same partners enable us to acquire individual skills that would hardly be achieved by playing alone.
